vendor_name: Hotel Oran Bay Managed By Accor
title: Elegant Algeria Beachside Retreat in Oran Bay with Mediterranean Sea Views
description:
In the heart of Oran's thriving city centre, a stone's throw from the picturesque Mediterranean coast, lies a luxurious retreat that encapsulates the rich history and vibrant culture of Algeria's second-largest city. This five-star sanctuary,offers an ideal base to explore the captivating Santa Cruz Fortress, or wander the bustling streets of the Quartier de Sidi El Houari.

Indulge in Hotel Oran Bay's excellent facilities, including a state-of-the-art fitness centre and a tranquil spa offering rejuvenating treatments. Savour authentic Algerian cuisine at the onsite Le Canastel restaurant or venture out to the nearby Le Theatre d'Oran for a taste of the city's thriving arts scene.
location_description: Hotel Oran Bay Managed By Accor
